mapper.insert:
SELECT chat_room_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO chat_room ( cr_no, empl_no, cr_title, cr_date ) VALUES ( #{crNo}, #{emplNo}, #{crTitle}, SYSDATE )

SELECT chat_msg_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO chat_msg ( cm_no, cr_no, empl_no, cm_content, cm_date, cm_type, file_identify ) VALUES ( #{cmNo}, #{crNo}, #{emplNo}, #{cmContent}, SYSDATE, #{cmType}, #{fileIdentify} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(cm_no) FROM chat_msg WHERE cr_no = #{crNo} AND cm_type != 'SYSTEM'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cp.empl_no) FROM cr_participant cp LEFT JOIN chat_msg cm ON cp.cr_no = cm.cr_no AND cm.cm_no = ( SELECT MAX(cm_no) FROM chat_msg WHERE cr_no = #{crNo} AND cm_type != 'SYSTEM' ) WHERE cp.cr_no = #{crNo} AND cp.empl_no != #{emplNo} AND cm.cm_type != 'SYSTEM' AND (cp.last_read_cm_no IS NULL OR cp.last_read_cm_no < cm.cm_no) AND cp.cm_exit = 'N'

SELECT cr.cr_no, cr.cr_title, ( SELECT MAX(cm_date) FROM chat_msg WHERE cr_no = cr.cr_no AND cm_type = 'TEXT' ) AS lastMessageDate, ( SELECT cm_content FROM chat_msg WHERE cr_no = cr.cr_no AND cm_type = 'TEXT' ORDER BY cm_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) AS lastMessageContent FROM chat_room cr WHERE cr.cr_no IN ( SELECT cr_no FROM cr_participant WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND cm_exit = 'N' ) ORDER BY lastMessageDate DESC
SELECT cr_no, empl_no, cr_title, cr_date FROM chat_room WHERE cr_no = #{crNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cr_participant ( cr_no, empl_no, empl_nm, last_read_cm_no, cm_auth, cr_date, cm_exit ) VALUES ( #{crNo}, #{emplNo}, NVL((SELECT empl_nm FROM employee WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo}), 'UNKNOWN'), #{cmNo}, (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'HOST' ELSE 'GUEST' END FROM cr_participant WHERE cr_no = #{crNo}), SYSDATE, #{cmExit} )
mapper.select: SELECT cr_no, empl_no, empl_nm, last_read_cm_no, cm_auth, cr_date, cm_exit FROM cr_participant WHERE cr_no = #{crNo}

SELECT cp.cr_no, cp.empl_no, e.empl_nm, cp.last_read_cm_no, cp.cm_auth, cp.cr_date, cp.cm_exit FROM cr_participant cp JOIN employee e ON cp.empl_no = e.empl_no WHERE cp.cr_no = #{crNo} AND cp.empl_no = #{emplNo} AND cp.cm_exit = 'N'
SELECT empl_no, empl_nm FROM employee WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo}

SELECT cm.cm_no, cm.cr_no, cm.empl_no, e.empl_nm, cm.cm_content, cm.cm_date, cm.cm_type, df.file_path AS fileUrl FROM chat_msg cm LEFT JOIN employee e ON cm.empl_no = e.empl_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_identify, MAX(file_no) AS max_file_no, MAX(file_path) AS file_path FROM doc_file GROUP BY file_identify ) df ON df.file_identify = cm.file_identify WHERE cm.cr_no = #{crNo} ORDER BY cm.cm_date DESC OFFSET #{page} * #{size} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT c.cr_no, c.cr_title, NVL(cm.lastMessageDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS lastMessageDate, NVL(cm.lastMessageContent, '대화 없음') AS lastMessageContent, NVL(uc.unreadCount, 0) AS unreadCount FROM chat_room c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cr_no, MAX(cm_date) AS lastMessageDate, MAX(cm_content) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY cm_date DESC) AS lastMessageContent FROM chat_msg GROUP BY cr_no ) cm ON c.cr_no = cm.cr_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cr_no, COUNT(*) AS unreadCount FROM chat_msg WHERE cm_no > NVL( (SELECT last_read_cm_no FROM cr_participant WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND cm_exit = 'N'), 0 ) GROUP BY cr_no ) uc ON c.cr_no = uc.cr_no WHERE c.cr_no IN ( SELECT cr_no FROM cr_participant WHERE empl_no = #{emplNo} AND cm_exit = 'N' ) ORDER BY lastMessageDate DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM cr_participant WHERE cr_no = #{crNo} AND cm_exit = 'N' ORDER BY cr_date ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
